ThingDef.label: black garlic
ThingDef.description:
Black garlic is a type of aged garlic that undergoes a fermentation-like process, resulting in soft, dark-colored cloves. Unlike regular garlic, black garlic has a sweet, mild flavour with hints of molasses, balsamic vinegar, and tamarind, lacking the sharp pungency of fresh garlic.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 25 black garlic requires 50 garlic for a total value of 55, and sells for 3, giving a <color=#33CC33>26.67%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Fermentation time:</color> 1.66 days.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.05 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>60</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.48</color> (for reference, Yayo is 0.35).

ThingDef.label: black mayonnaise
ThingDef.description:
A novel and luxurious take on regular mayonnaise, black mayonnaise is made by blending mayonnaise with black garlic. This gives it a unique, earthy sweetness and deep, umami-rich flavor, along with a striking dark color.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 black mayonnaise requires mayonnaise and black garlic for a total value of 530, and sells for 150, giving a <color=#33CC33>64.67%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 4000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.38</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.3 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>500</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> Depends on so many factors it's hard to give a concrete number.
